scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-color:d3,d3-dispatch:d3,d3-collection:d3,d3-format:d3,d3-interpolate:d3,d3-sankey-diagram:d3,d3-timer:d3,d3-selection:d3,d3-expandable-sankey:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-expandable-sankey.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-expandable-sankey.js -c -m -o build/d3-expandable-sankey.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-expandable-sankey.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-expandable-sankey.js build/d3-expandable-sankey.min.js
